about_the_game:
FRANTIC COMBAT RACING


Cyberpunk styled combat racing inspired by all the amazing 90's and 00's racers! Featuring fast paced, frantic racing action with intense strategic combat across 25 tracks! Start your career in the single player Early Access league with 5+ championships to test your skills in!

EXPLOSIVE WEAPONS AND ABILITIES


Equip four types of abilities simultaneously for ultimate destructive capabilities! Load up with homing missiles, plasma launchers, laser cannons, proximity mines, drone turrets and more! 16+ abilities available for a multitude of combinations. Strategy and combos are key if you want to quickly dispatch opponents.

MANAGE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM


Change team liveries, colours, chassis, race numbers, wheels, loadout and more. Build relationships with fellow pilots and draft them on your team. Research abilities and technologies then set your loadouts before the event.

MASTER GAME MODES


Loads of game modes to conquer! Races, team races, elimination and time trial events available from Early Access. A vast array of options are available to customise your own custom racing experience! Add obstacles, explosive barrels, allow no weapons, set respawn times and other modifiers for a unique experience!

name: Phaseshift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum systems not tested, game will likely support slower computers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Brace yourself for a face-peeling blast through cyberpunk styled locales! Engage in frantic vehicular combat with over 16 highly explosive abilities and weapons. Inspired by Extreme-G, Rollcage, Wipeout and other 90s/00s combat racers.
